name: Mabosstiff
flavorText: This Pokémon can store energy in its large dewlap. Mabosstiff unleashes this energy all at once to blow away enemies.

previous.name: Maschiff
previous.flavorText: It always scowls in an attempt to make opponents take it seriously, but even crying children will burst into laughter when they see Maschiff’s face.

next.name: Shroodle
next.flavorText: Though usually a mellow Pokémon, it will sink its sharp, poison-soaked front teeth into any that anger it, causing paralysis in the object of its ire.
